jd: From: rajkumar, NITYA Software Solutions Inc. rajkumar.v@nityainc.com Reply to: rajkumar.v@nityainc.com Hi,I hope you are doing well.I am Raj from NITYA Software Solutions Inc.I've included below the job description, please let me know if you are interested, and reply with one updated resume, which I've expected.Role: Business AnalystAnalyze and document business requirements, processes, and workflows to align with the development of custom .NET applications.Collaborate with stakeholders to gather, define, and prioritize requirements.Work closely with development teams to ensure technical solutions meet business objectives.Perform gap analysis and recommend process improvements.Facilitate communication between business users and technical teams to ensure a clear understanding of requirements and solutions.Develop and maintain comprehensive documentation, including business requirements documents (BRDs), functional specifications, and user stories.Conduct user acceptance testing (UAT) and ensure smooth implementation of custom .NET applications.Provide training and support to end-user's post-implementation.Thank you,RajkumarEMAIL ID:rajkumar.v@nityainc.comNITYA Software Solutions Inc.
